summary: Completed comprehensive testing of HR Performance Management app after Tiptap editor implementation. All core functionality is working perfectly. Backend APIs fully functional (19/19 tests passed). Frontend completely operational with successful Tiptap rich text editor integration. Full end-to-end workflow tested: Employee dashboard → Manager review → PDF export.
passed_tests: Backend API health check (19/19 tests passed)
Email authentication flow (admin, manager, employee accounts)
Employee dashboard loads with Tiptap rich text editors
Employee self-review and goals editing with formatting toolbar
Employee save draft and submit for manager review functionality
Manager dashboard shows direct reports with status tracking
Manager navigation to review detail pages
Manager feedback and ratings (Performance, Collaboration, Growth)
Admin dashboard with users and cycles tabs
Admin user import via JSON functionality
PDF export functionality (employee and manager views)
Complete review workflow: Employee → Manager → Completed
Rich text content persistence and display

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (All features working - Login, Employee Dashboard, Manager Dashboard, Admin Dashboard, PDF Export)
